review: Poured a dark brown with a small tan head. Aroma of roast malt, a little coffee and dark chocolate, dark alcohol soaked fruit. Full body, flavour as the aroma. Could have been a bit more coffee-ish.

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: Sweet bourbon, raisins, only a bit of coffee. Amazingly rich. Sharp start, but worth the complexity. Medicinal hops, alcohol burn. Oily body. Big, powerful brew for the bourbon lover. (ZeeBra)

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: Bottle. Pitch black with a small brown head.  Aroma is bourbon first and foremost, coffee, caramel, just a little green pepper.  Taste is very sweet, almost no bitterness, a little alcohol.  Finish is sweet, alcoholic with a littl…

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: 22 oz bottle. Bottled on 11/12/ 12. Nose is really nice. Earthy coffee, chocolate, brown sugar and oak. Flavor is really delightful. Chocolate up front with oak, bourbon with some deep roasted notes. Secondary notes…

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: Draft. Pours jet black with a little chocolate colored head. Nose is syrupy bourbon, chocolate and just a hint of coffee. Taste is very similar. Kinda wish the coffee was a bit more prominent as this is pretty similar to the…

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: 22 ounce bottle from 2011, divvied up among 6. Aroma is light roast coffee beans, fireplace wood pile, bourbon and caramel. Appearance is black, thin residue of brown lacing on the glass, a layer of foam film on the surface…

beername: Goose Island Bourbon County Stout - Coffee  R
review: Dark black.  No head.  Dark.  Smells like bourbon.  Tastes like bourbon.  Thanks Tony bretz.

12 ounce can at sisters house in Stow Ohio. Smell like some lemon in this. Clear yellow light white head. Smooth and easy drinking. Wheat and lemon aftertaste. Nice summer beer. Cheers!
12 ounce can. Mild aroma and disappearing head. Refreshing crisp mouth feel and mild malt taste with mild hop balance. Good thirst quencher! Prosit!
Found out of bottle from a friend.  Pous a faint hazy yellow with quick foam. Very nuch a summer beer. Light and refreshing. More for quantities on a hot day.

Light amber pour. Very bready and yeasty aroma and flavor. Rather chewy for this style. Not bad but not very typical. Can.

Light crisp clean fruit flavor with bitter finish.  I am surprised that this is a German style based beer.  The German beers I have had are more robust with stronger personality.

Not bad.  Nice for a summer brew.  Light and crisp with a bit of hops at the end.  Recommend for a hot summer day by the pool.

Bottle. Pours a crystal clear light gold color with a small fizzy white head and poor retention. No lacing. Crisp, pilsner-like mouthfeel. Tastes like a pilsner too, except less sharp and more bread in the finish. Decent.

Pours piss yellow with an absence of aroma and a smooth, unremarkable flavor. It is a refreshing hot weather beer nothing more, nothing less. Good for cuddling in the corner booth with your cutie butt.

Hazy brown with a thin tan head.  Aroma of sugar, caramel, fruit and citrus.  Taste of sugar and caramel up front followed by a rye moment that’s finished off quickly with a  citrus hop burst.  Pretty solid - whatever it is.

Bottle. Pours a beautiful deep, clear copper with a small dense off-white head.  There is a good ring and some foam along the top throughout with very good lacing along the sides.  Absolutely wonderful looking brew.  Th…
Simple beer, but well crafted nonetheless.  Dark brown colored body.  Citrus hops make their way through, with some bready and caramel malts in the background.  Faint rye notes.

12 oz. bottle. The aroma is both hoppy and malty. Caramel, toffee, hazelnut, pitted fruit (peach and a hint of plum), and milk chocolate scents from the malts. Pine and citrus scents from the hops. Complex and…

Tap @ sheffield’s. Hop aroma with sweet, dark fruit notes and rye evident. Slightly hazy body with rapidly rising bubbles. Wonderful appearance. Off-white head. Beautiful lace. A mix of citrus, sweet rye malt, spruce, fresh…

12oz. bottle.  Dark malty, grainy aroma, suggestions of the palm sugar and rye, showing hints of citrus, fresh hops and brown sugar.  Medium sienna in color, head is uneven and lasting, nice lacing as well.  Flavor contains a…

Bottle.  Reddish-brown pour with very little head.  Aroma of sweet malt, rye and hops.  Lots of rye and hop bitterness in the flavor.  Nice sweetness from the palm sugar.  Soft, smooth mouthfeel.  Very nice beer.

Ruby red in color, shimmering when held to the light like a quality gem.  Beautiful frothy eggshell head.  Aroma is somewhat citrusy aroma is present, along with a nice malty sweetness.  The rye is more evident in th…

Bottle compliments of bgburdman9. Dark mahogany colour with a foamy tan head that hangs around a little. Nice citrus hop aroma but doesn’t overpower some of the sugar/caramel scents. Flavour was pink grapfruit…

Effervescent. Complex flavor and aroma with lots of tasty layers. The sugar adds a nice dryness, yet provides some nice complexity, while the rye and summit add their spicy, aromatic flavors. Very inventive.
Yum.  Dark amber pour with an off white head and nice lacing.  Piney hop nose.  A piney yet sweet/sugary taste.  Killed my palate.

I found myself frequently drinking this on draft at a local bar which indicates I like it more than I think.  Pours more brown than red with scent of hops and rye.  There is no mistaking the rye flavor but the hops are…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: i smell pineapple, resin, sage and alcohol. Like the body of it, some heft but not thick. a bitter edge, katana like, but still some underlying, fruity sweetness (the unicorn influence.) Love the can art, and the name. But it'…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Colour….clear gold with a huge head. Nose…dank, piney hops with dusty hop leaf. Palate…big, malty and full of heady piney hops. The body in this is rather light despite the headiness of the hops and maltiness. The…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Very nice floral hop aroma. Clear golden color. Light body, medium sweet taste. Easy finish, light sweet and some hops. Pretty good overall.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Copenhagen 3/6 202. 47,3 cl can from DrikBeer web-shop- Colorful, cartoonish can with a Ninja taking on a rabid Unicorn.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Burk. Klar guldfärgad med ett medelstort beständigt vitt skum. Dofter av grapefrukt, örter, tall. Smakinslag av grapefrukt, apelsin, karamell, örter, tall. Klassiskt och gott.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Golden with a white head - Hop aroma with some herbal notes - Malt body with a herbal hop flavour that has nice bitterness - herbal hop flavours and bitterness goes into the finish - This was good

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: From can (BB June'24!) in IPA glass. Pours near clear deep gold w/big slow-settling beige head, dank piney citrus aroma. Nice honey sweetness from the malt, rising bitterness not as big as I'd expect from the label.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: I got this 16 oz can courtesy of Halftime and it shows a born-on date of 9/12/22. Out of the cabinet is my Cowtown snifter to handle the tasting this evening. I lift the can into the glass to see a semi-transparent light…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Nice artwork on can!
Hazy gold pour , big frothy white head. Bits of lace on glass. Fruity, bready and spicy smells & a whiff of alcohol. Tastes like a west coast IPA as…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Brooklyn Burgers and Beer: pours gold with white head. Aroma is grapefruit, some light pine. West Coast, but pretty mellow when it comes to bitterness. Nice hop character. Perhaps a tad soapy.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Not sure where the Ninja is from, but they make a nice pair. No mention of the hops used here, but it's tending to West Coast.
Aroma, hop forward, has pine, grapefruit and tropical notes, with biscuity…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Brew Festival 2022. Golden color with a white head. Aroma is pine, grapefruit. flavor is pine, grapefruit, oranges, citrus, caramel, malt, alcohol. Nice beer. Bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Superficial festival rating at Brew Festival, Oslo 2022. Saturday session 1.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: On tap at Brew Festival. It's a foggy pale golden colored beer with a big, creamy white head leaving curtains. The  aroma is mostly piney and grapefruity, with some alcohol hints and a nice maltyness. It's full-bodied,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 0,473 litre Can, shared at Scandic Kødbyen, Copenhagen. Golden with white head. Malts, hops, yeast, Piney, herbal, some Piney bitterness.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Almost clear gold with a cm of white head. Big tropical fruit aroma with bread crust and pine. Some medicinal notes. Just nudging up on syrupy. Moderate carbonation. Sweet to very sweet with tropical and…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Chicago enjoyed in Memphis after deciding it was too cold to run! Pours a fairly clear gold color with a medium white head that lasts. Bigger aroma with some citrus and dank, earthy hops. Mild and balanced…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 16 oz can. Smells of pine and grapefruit. Clear and golden yellow. Almost looks like a lager. Tastes of grapefruit, touch of dank herbs, fleeting hint of malts. Finish is lightly bitter which lingers. Nice DIPA!

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Great double IPA. Strong hops presence. Nice golden color and full body. Very drinkable.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Yellow with a large head. Tangy, peppery and herbal. Medium length finish. Moderately full bodied.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can.  Clear and golden with a pretty big and standing head.  The aroma has nice floral perfumes.  It drinks with a slippery mouthfeel, oily, laden with hoppy acids.  Quite nice.  (#7917, 3/2021)

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: On tap at Man in the Moon. Hazy golden with a medium white head. Hops, grapefruit, citrus and some mango. Bitter finish. A nice one.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Pours lightly hazy orange with a large, frothy off-white head, long retention. Heavy orange juice hops, light pineapple hops, medium hop bitterness, medium sweet bread malt, and a dry finish. Medium-full body…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pours a clear yellow orange color with a soapy white head.  Aroma of citrus, tropical fruit, and resin.  Citrus flavor with grapefruit and pine.  Solid hop bitterness. Nice beer.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Slight haze yellow orange color with a white head. Tropical fruit pine aroma. Tropical fruit little resin slight malt flavor. Medium body. Easy drinking for a double.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 16 oz can pours an amber color with a small white head.  Aromas of citrus, pine, grapefruit. Medium bodied, creamy, very nice.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Amber beer with a cream head. Summer fruit and citrus aroma. Grapefruit and pine flavor with light summer fruit. Medium bodied. Good bitterness. Grapefruit and pine linger with light summer fruit.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

review: Pours clear topaz with a thick and persistent porcelain head. Aroma delivers resiny hops, tangy and sweet grapefruit and orange, fresh malt, tropical and funky hints. Flavor provides rich piney hops, a little bitterness…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can pour, cloudygold color. Sweet pine sap aroma. Flavors of dank pineapple, sap and caramel. Solid malt notes like whole grain bread underpin the hops.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pretty hazy yellowish color with a nice frothy white head. Aroma is ripe pineapple, mango, hops, sweet candy sugar. Taste is a little dull. Not that complex. Pine, little grapefruit, citrus. ripe tropical fruit. Smooth mouthfeel.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Sampled at All In Beer Fest 2019. Clear golden. Bready malt, piney and perfumy hops. Dry, medium bitterness. Classic DIPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can, shared. Thanks, Justin! Smells very much like a hazy New England style brew, buzzy, fuzzy, and fruity. Flavors also juicy fruity, but then the hop attack hits. Bittering becomes harsh. From mid palate to finish it is tangy,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Light tasting ipa that is crisp with grapefruit that overtakes the flavor. One of the best IPAs ever.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pale hazy gold. Fruity pebbles aroma.Good malts, mild bitter. Med sweet.I would get again.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

review: Can sample at a tasting at Yoav's place. Hazy gold with a white head. Peach, some banana cake, green hops aroma, bitter, hoppy and dry taste. Medium body, bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Cloudy yellow beer. Has grapefruit and lemon, some sweet fruits too and moderate bitterness for a DIPA. Obviously not fresh anymore, sadly.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Alcohol bien integrado. Cuerpo y color a caballo entre una neipa y una ipa moderna. No parece que tenga tantos ibus. Bebible.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Can at a tasting. Hazy golden with a thick head. Aroma of fruity hops. 
Sweet, fruity, mango, peach, pineapple, bitter finish. 
Medium-bodied, smooth.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Timothy O’Tooles. Pours yellow and cloudy with a white head. Lots of pine and citrus on the nose and tongue. Finished with a fair amount of bitterness. Eh!

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

review: Pours golden in color with minimal haze, hoppy aroma with a hint of sweet fruit, mild sweetness upfront, biting hops and a touch of pine at the end, very smooth, tap.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

review: On tap at BrewDog, Tallinn. Slightly hazy golden with a fairly modest white head. Hoppy and fruity with herbal notes. Moderate sweet with medium flavour intensity and bitterness. Well balanced and enjoyable.

review: Draft at Bru Craft. Hazy gold pour with a dense white head. Lots of lace. Bitter oranges. Herbal honey drops. Grapefruit. Pine and pineapple. Syrupy caramel malts. Heavy carbonation. Some alcohol bite in the finish.

review: Keg, Brewdog Leicester. Golden with a thin head. Floral elderflower wine with pithy grapefruit. Apricot. Tropical fruit. Spicy alcohol. Decent dipa.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Can from BrewDog online store.
Rich citruses on a nose. Juicy flavors on tongue. Alcohol is well hidden. Enjoyable drinking.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: They grabbed me with the name but this is an excellent Smooth drinking IIPA with an ABV of 8%!  If I had to compare it to a similar beer it would be lord Hobo’s boom sauce but smoother.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Cloudy, yellow brown colour with a creamy white head. Sweet aroma of tropical fruit and malts. Bitter hoppy taste, malty, heavy hop aftertaste. Low medium body and carbonation, very smooth mouthfeel.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Juice and flavorful.  Lost of citrus, but enough bitterness to not be syrupy.  Very tasty .

review: Sampled @ Billie's Craft Beer Fest 2018, Day 1. A almost clear golden beer with a small white head. Aroma of grapefruit, citrus, strong malt. Taste of strong riped fruits, grapefruit, zest, long bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Potente de principio a fin, color ámbar, al entrar en boca las maletas dejan notarse para en su final dejar protagonismo al lúpulo, estando el alcohol presente. Fruta madura, pan, notas herbaceas

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 47,3 cl blik. Wazig blond bier met witte wand klevende schuimkraag. Geur: lichte hop geur, licht zweterig, mout, ietwat fruit. Smaak: zachte hopbitterheid, grassig, wat harsig, wat fruitig, pompelmoes, agrum. Romig…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Poured golden with a medium off white head. Aroma is of sweet malt and some caramel, orange, lots of citrus and more pine hops. Taste is medium sweet malt, caramel, medium orange citrus and pine resiny hops,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Dåse. Let uklar, gylden, kraftig hvid skum, som bliver liggende i 5-10 mm lag, flot. Humlet (grape bitter), frisk og lidt malt i aroma. Smagen er umiddelbart afdæmpet, god balance kraftig humlet, lidt malt sødme, fin…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Tap at brewberry, paris. Hazy yellow color, white head. Aroma has hops, fruits, some wheat. Hopoy and bitter taste, could be more smooth, fruity.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Color dorado amarillento, turbio, con capa de espuma blanca de dos dedos de grosor y buena retención. Carbonatación mínima visualmente. Textura oleosa. Aroma a cítricos, pino, malta caramelizada de fondo y resina. No…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: From can. Hazy golden color, small white head. Aroma pine, tropical fruit. Medium body, lightly carbonated, not much alcohol. Flavor is moderately bitter with grassy and fruity hops. Light malt sweetness. A…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: (nez & bouche hop-exotic, ipa sobre, gavant le houblon qui compte pour tout (et rien), s’h2o-ïse, french-like)

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Draft at the Kultainen Apina, Hervanta, Finland. Enjoyed on September 1 2018.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Tap at Kultainen Apina. Pours cloudy yellow white head. Sweet tropical fruits,  peach, grapefruit, citrus, fruity hoppiness, pine. Full body, average carbonation, bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: A small taste from wiosna (tap) @ Brewskival 2018. Pours cloudy golden with a medium head. Aroma is sweet fruity malts. Flavor is sweet malts with tropical fruits and a hoppy finish. Good.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: @la Mise en Bière - cloudy blond-orange beer with a creamy white foam left; nice lace; light yeasty with notes of apricots, oranges and wheat; full-bodied, sweet, astringent and solidly bitter; creamy palate; peaches and…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Fra dåse.
Hazy gul med solidt cremet skum.
Klar aroma af humle med noter af citrus, grapefrugt, gran, malt.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Keg at Cafe Beermoth, Manchester. A hazy deep golden colour with a medium white head. Aroma of gumballs, grapefruit, peach, pine, slight tea, a hint of toasted malts and subtle herbal hops. Taste of grapefruit, peach,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 47 cl can @ home. Pours slightly cloudy golden with a white head that leaves a little lacing. Aroma and flavour are peach, pine, and grapefruit - with a bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Thanks Maxbier. Pours Golden with white head. Citrus & pine aroma. Flavor is tropical fruit with citrus and pine. Great name and label,

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Lemony aroma, should be stronger. Hazy dark yellow with bright white head. Crisp hop profile, pine and citrus at the same time. Hefty palate with a carbonation bite at the end. Not excellent like the ratings suggest, but…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: A good classic west coast, resin piny, grapefruits and floral notes, golden with a good white head, light/medium body, average carbonation, good tropical bombwith a balanced bitter final...good!

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Disig gyllengul öl med ett vitt skum. Doft av citrus, tropiska frukter och lätta tallbarrs toner. I smaken tillkommer kryddiga humletoner.
Torr munkänsla. Komplex och god DIPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 47,3cl Can @ 3er Tiempo Tienda de Cervezas, Santander, Spain.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: arômes de fruits exotiques , une belle couleur orangée plutôt claire, le gout est aussi agréable que les arômes voir meme un peu plus car une  bonne amertume se laisse sentir mais rien de très fort, tenue en bouche plutôt…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Hazy golden with a small white head. Aroma is pine, tropical fruit and flowers. Taste is pineapple, apricot and passion fruit

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Nice head with good duration. Color is amber/golden. Aroma and taste are rich bitter hops, fruits, flowers, pine malt and has a nice bitter finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Light caramel, rotten peach and apricot aroma, signs of un-freshness. Cloudy yellow to orange color with small sized white head. Taste is much fresher, fruit no signs od oxidation. Medium to full body, soft to average…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: On tap @BPBW. Hazy golden, no head. Tropical fruits, some honey, moderate bitterness, very well balanced. It's pretty close to a NEIPA, I thought this was an old school west coast.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Niesamowita IPA, powiem szczerze, że myślałem, że amerykanie są przehajpowani - nie są. Tropiki aż walą w nozdrza, słodycz i goryczka idealnie zbalansowane, alkohol kompletnie niewyczuwalny. No po prostu…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can at Kaiser Tiger Chicago. Hazy amber colour lasting white head. A big tropical fruit double Neipa. Some wet hop but not too much and still the fruit comes through bright . Some bitterness on the finish. It's pretty good…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Mooi goudblond troebel met romige witte schuimkraag. Citrus, ananas, mango, passievrucht, perzik, exotisch. Vol en romig. Mild bittere afdronk. Super drinkbaar. Top dipa.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Trying to catch up on 150 or so ratings. Scores were memorialized at time of tasting, tasting notes were limited.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. From latiendadelacerveza. In Teku glass. Playing Avernun 2. Superb west coast ipa, with all its notes perfectly assembled and a really well hidden abv, making it very crushable and utterly treacherous

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: On tap at Craft Room Zagreb. Unclear golden coloured, small to medium sized white head, citrusy nose. Moderate sweet malty, oranges, light caramel and citrus with notes of alcohol. Dry bitter finish. Not bad at all.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 16oz can picked up at South Lyndale Liquors and consumed on a Friday night out of a Maine Beer Co. glass. Pours a light golden orange with plenty of haze. Frothy white head very apparent and appreciated. Nose is…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: On tap at Craft Room, Opatovina, Zagreb. Hazy golden, medium to large off-white head. Moderately hoppy, citrus, grapefruit, malts. Dry, juicy, nice flavour, light bitterness. Juicy texture, medium body, nice drinkability, light…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Unclear, golden colored, medium off white head, good lasting. Aroma is of sweetish malt and some caramel, orange, lots of citrus and more pine hops. Taste is medium+ sweet malt, caramel, medium+ orange citrus and…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Draft pour at Local 149 in South Boston. Mostly clear golden yellow with off-white head. Aromas of citrus, floral notes, malt. Tastes of malt, citrus, floral notes, hop oils, light booze. Medium body with a dry finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 20Apr2018 Tropical fruits, candied mango, passion fruit, papaya, sweet, overripe citrus fruits, orange, marmalade, pine. Hazy gold, medium, creamy, white head. Light bitter. More bittersweet, overripe tropical fruits, rotting…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Clear golden with a white head. Notes of mandarin oranges, melon, pine, stone fruit, pineapple, mango, other juicy tropical fruit. The alcohol is a bit present, the beer bitter and just a bit sweet.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 16 ounce can. Slightly hazed orange gold color. Large rocky white head. Big tropical fruit nose. Caramel malt backbone. Notes of peach, papaya, tangerine, mango and guava in midtaste. Bittersweet grapefruit and pine…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Near clear (not murky YAY!) golden orange with lasting small head and lace. Tangerine and pine aroma. Medium light apricot peach cereal honey sweetness with bracing piney resiny and citrusy bitterness in dry…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Found on tap in Chicago bar. Medium golden appearance but to me its all about the well put together combination of hops. Truly enjoyable mix of flavors. Great early Fall IPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Tap at muddy waters with samalito. Gold with medium white head and good lacing. Citrus hop nose. Sharp bite, crisp, alcohol present. Well done.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pint can. Bright tropical fruit aroma with notes of grapefruit and pine resiny hops. Pours cloudy golden colored with a huge off white head that has excellent retention and good lacing. Starts with bright tropical fruit flavors…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 0.473l can: not the freshest one; bottled on 11/17/17; Clean grainy-malty flavor, fruity, resinous, citrusy hop profile. High-medium hop bitterness, medium body, Smooth & dangerously drinkable.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can, 0.473l. Aroma of citrus, passion fruit, pineapple and mango. Pours cloudy golden color with medium creamy off-white head, good lacing and sparkling appearance. Taste starts with medium sweet toasted malt,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Piwo ciemnozłote, opalizujące. Piana kremowa, bardzo trwała. W aromacie owoce tropikalne, grapefruit, trawa. W smaku bardzo przyjemna wysoka goryczka, grapefruitowa, długa. Wytrawne. Średnie wysycenie. Bardzo…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pint canned 02/06/2018. Lightly foggy topaz with some nice legs and a creamy half inch disc on top. Smells of garlic, flowery pollen, toast, resin, pineapple and mixed citrus. Tastes of garlic salt, ugli fruit, resin, dank…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Hazy gold, cream head, lacing. Grapefruit juice, fresh grass, cream, light vanilla. Balsamic taste, pink grapefruit, hoppy soul.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: From Bellmore Beverage. The aroma is floral hops, caramel. The appearance is amber, slightly hazy. The flavor is floral, caramel. The finish is floral hops. Medium in body. Pretty good.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Drank 02-03-18 while Skyping with Rik. Pretty rich, soft beer. Not as malty as most double IPAs, which is a good thing. Balanced, some citrus and hop notes.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Good stuff. Not too bitter, not modern fruity. Could use a bit more body for a DIPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Placed in the "Thought I Rated This" category. Pours a cloudy golden with a thin white head. The aroma is pretty strong and consists of pine, peach, grapefruit, mango, resin, and some easy herbal notes. The taste isn't as…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Közepes, tartós hab, tiszta, borostyán szín. Enyhe, citrusos, kissé fűszeres illat. Grapefruitos, narancsos, mandarinos ízek, barack, ananász és más déligyümölcsök aromáival, pici gyantával. Közepesen testes, közepesen…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Such a cool label! It pours hazy golden with a creamy white head. Tropical fruity aroma with spicy berry and crunchy malty notes. The flavor is quite malty and biscuity with exotic hoppy notes. Ripe orange, lemon,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Barwa mandarynkowa, zmętniona. A aromacie mnostwo zywicy jałowca, grejpfruta, spore utlenienie (najwięcej miodu). W smaku glownie chmiel i cytryna bez rewelacji ale dobrze zrownowazone. Pozniej pojawia sie…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pours a deep gold, orange coloration with a medium foamy head. Smells of biscuity malt and tropical fruit: passion fruit, guava, pineapple with a hint of citrus fruit: grapefruit, tangerine, lime. Taste follows the nose, with a…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Tap @Taphouse. Hazy orange, white froth. Piney, peachy and caramely aroma. Similar flavour, fruity with lasting hoppy bitterness. Sweet with herbal finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Virkelig god IPA. Tung fylde med masser af humle, sødme og balanceret krop.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Enormous thanks Sandi! Poured a hazy golden-amber body. Peachy, orangey, grapefruity creamy aroma with light herbal touches. Hops everywhere! Creamy taste, herbal, orangey and peachy notes, ending dry.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Another beaten up can.
Pours hazy golden yellow, three fingers thick compact head.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can at home from DeBierkonig, 21st January 18. Pours orange, some haze, not much head. Aroma is mango, ripe tropical fruit. Taste is fruity, mango, ripe citrus, resin, orange, bitter marmalade, so smooth and balanced.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Burk beställd från Mikkeller. Disigt gul med vitt skum. Doft av tropiska frukter. Smak av kryddig humle.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Burk Amerikansk Pint från Mikkellers webshop. Disig gulaktig vätska.
En mycket färskhumlig doft av mandarin, gräs, mango och grape.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Boxbeers. Pale yellow with white head. Fresh, grassy with grapefruit, lemon, a bit of biscuity. Slightly resinous. Very nice.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Aroma: citrus notes, sweet, pine.
Appearance: hazy golden color and white head.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: (Draught at Muted Horn, Berlin, 27 Aug 2017) Hazy golden colour with dense, white head. Fruity, hoppy nose with citrus, grapefruit, tropical fruit and pineapple. Fruity, hoppy taste with notes of citrus, grapefruit, tropical…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Creamy white good mostly lasting head. Yellow colour. Moderate malty and heavy hoppy aroma. Moderate bitter flavor. Average moderate bitter finish. Pine and mango. Creamy palate.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Trader Joe's. Aroma is lush fruits. Full bodied, tastes of creamy citrus with very smooth bready malts. A bit of hot turpentine alcohol throws it off a bit. Very bitter but smooth and balanced finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Canned date 9/12/17. Nice pungent aroma of fresh citrus, grapefruit and a hint of lemon and mellon. Cloudy light orange color with a white head. Sweet malt up front. Carmel quickly drowned out with layers of citrus and…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Ein schleichender Hopfengott landet kopfüber im frischgeernteten Obstkorb. Sanfte CrispAbstecher in Richtung Gras,Cake&Bubblegum! Big Can from Scottie & the US. Thaannnxxxxx...

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Been seeking this out for some time, can dated 8.30.17..collectible can with some memorable artwork, pours a great golden orange color with 1 finger head, tight carbonation, nose is citrus with some apricot n mango,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Aromat cytrusowy. Smak intensywny mocno goryczkowy. Posmak również goryczkowy. Średnio pijalnie, aczkolwiek nie jest złe

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: aromas of citrus, and pine, very faint malt notes. gold and hazy in color with really nice long lasting head. taste if hop forward. strong notes of pine and resin, faint citrus. faint underlying malt notes

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pours a hazy golden color with medium white head. Tropical fruits are very present on the aroma, mango, papaya, passion fruit and grapefruit, with orange and lime zest in the back. Taste follows the nose, lots of tropical…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Binny's in Chicago - as the guy in there said "that's gonna be hard to beat!" It's the gold standard for me now. Still trying to find something in the UK that comes close.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Beautitiful dark hazy yellow with an effortless clean full pure white whippy head. Good tropical fresh nose. Some dancing acidity from the onset followed by a long resiny bitter taste before ending with a refreshing…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Tropical aroma of mango, peach and pineapple with a little grapefruit. Pours hazy golden orange with a white head that had good retention and left great lacing. Sweet taste of grapefruit, caramel, bready malt, orange…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: La cutie. Suculentă, proaspătă, cu o droaie de hamei, dar și cu malț. Echilibrată, dulce exact cât trebuie, potentă. E acolo sus, printre cele mai bune DIPA-uri.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Large Format Can - Feels thick on the palate. Taste tropical, get hints of grapefruit. High alcohol taste to it.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Brewskival, Lördag. Klar blekguldig. Funkig och dank med apelsinskal, bränt socker, kåda, granskott. Fin sötma möter bra beska. Trevlig!

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: hazy orange colour, moderate sized dense off-white head; aroma of pineapple, mango, tangerine, some bread, pine resiny notes and some marmalade; taste of pineapple juice, mango, tangerine, hints of honey and…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Schiuma non super compatta, colore giallo paglierini velato,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Buena presencia, un aroma floral muy chulo y demasiado cítrica en boca sería mi resumen. El.color ya avisa de que será difícil encontrar notas caramelizadas, el aroma, pese a lo fragante y floral, ya anticipa cáscaras…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: From a 16 oz. can. Pours a hazy greenish gold with a thick off white head. Aroma of lemon citrus and pine. Flavor is moderately bitter finish with some caramel flavors to mellow things out. Nice DIPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Beergium. Amber color, white head. Bitter taste with citrus, hops, resin, mango, caramel, pine, toast and grass. Bitter finish with citrus, hops, resin, toast, pine, mango and grass. Excellent imperial IPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
15/06/2022
Turbid golden beer with a slight off-white head. Medium/heavy aroma; taste starts medium/heavy sweet and ends slightly bitter and dry. Syrup,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: A golden beer, a head is medium and blond. Aroma has tropical mangos and pineapples, fructose, some fresh pine forest and fruit candies. Taste has tropical mangos, pineapples, resin and pine, at least medium+…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can, 2 weeks old, many thanks FinnIckler! Clear golden color with white head. Aroma is cat piss, tropical fruits, blueberries. Taste is tropical fruits, biscuity. Oily mouthfeel, warming finish. Excellent DIPA!

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Clear golden with little white head. Aroma is slight herbs and less fruit. Taste is a mix of bitter fruit and sweet sugar icing. A bit heavy. But very smooth. Good.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Pours clear yellow. Nose is pretty fruity, citrus, orange. Palate is oily mouthfeel, fruity middle, spicy and bitter finish. Really good.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Pours almost clear pale yellow with a big head and a good retention. Aroma is citrus, cat piss, tropical fruit, pine, sweat socks. Body is medium but quite sweet, still strongly bitter, especially towards the palate. almost…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: December 4, 2014 - with blankboy, gregclow, jercraigs and mabel - bomber. Hazy gold with a creamy/frothy white head. Simple but appealing aroma - fruity malt, floral bitterness, some alcohol, citrus zest. Taste follows but…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can from Beer Republic @ morning after Benzai is uitgepierd tasting, 10 cl sample. Hazy golden color, short frothy head. Aroma is verh fruity, some candy sweetness. Medium bitterness, bit malty and fruity sweetness.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can @ Benzai is zo dood als een pier tasting - The day after. Kinda hung over. Lightly unclear yellow color, average sized white to off-white head. Aroma is very nice: hops, tropical fruit hops, mango, peach. Taste malts,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 473 ml can. No freshness info.…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: 50cl can from beergium. Hazy orange. Thin white head. Medium bitterness. Medium body. Dry finish. Aroma and flavour is grapefruit, orange zest, hops, mango, pineapple juice, blueberries.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Good and hoppy. Really smooth for a double. On a side note my daughter’s favorite can ever.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: W aromacie nafta, białe owoce i kwiaty. W smaku bardzo fajnie, słodko. Słodkie winogrona, liczi, po dłuższej chwili do gry wchodzi grejpfrutowa goryczka. Mega pijalne jak na DIPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Hop, szklankę piwa, hop! Puszkowa wersja. Lekko mętne, świetnie zbalansowany owoc z goryczką, nie przeładowane słodami, znakomite w swojej kategorii.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: A 1 pint can, canned on 14th April 2017. Poured into a Lost Abbey teku glass. It was a slightly hazy golden orange colour with a two finger white head that had good retention and left great lacing. Aromas were a very ni…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Pours hazy golden orange with large, white stiff head. Smell is grapfruit, orange, citrusy, slightly piney. Taste is also full of citrus, sweet, has mango and grapfruit aftertase. Body is smooth and a bit oily with fine…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Hazy yellow golden color with a fine white head. Good lacing. Looks nice and inviting. Fine pleasant aroma. Medium (+) body and an average carbonation level. Mellow sweetness and a fine bitterness. Semi dry…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:
Can

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review:

Wygląd; jasnozłote, przejrzyste, bardzo ładna i wysoka, biała,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Ticked, July-17 @himmeriget. Aroma of citrus, peachy, grapefruit. Malty backbone of caramel. Moderate sweet and heavy bitter

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Almost 3 month old can Pours towards clear orange with a white head. Aroma of citrus, peach, sweet orange, mandarin, grassy hops, slight malt and pine. The taste is hoppy and slight juicy with notes of grassy hops,…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: @Basunen 17-7-1: ingen käftsmäll av frukt, men en stabil och trevlig balans av humle och lite tropisk frukt. Trevlig hetta.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Slab krāsa un izteiksmīga garšīga puta. Specigs aromats. Laba balnseta rūgta tumīga garša.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Poured from can dated 4/25/17 nice hazy orange with a nice fluffy white head. Aromas of fresh tropical fruit floral notes and pine. Taste is nice caramel malt mango pineapple nice pine finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Really an amazing DIPA. Lots of fresh fleshy tropical fruits. Mango cantalope. Aroma is in your face with a bit of juicy fruit gum. Hop is there and builds a light balanced bite. Lasting head. Really this things is…

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: A nice, well balanced double IPA. Tons of citrus, grapefruit, and hints of pine. Has a deep bitterness cut by a dense malty backbone. Tried at Kumas Too with Dave, Brandon, Josh, and Brian after ASEH in 2017.

review: very smooth drinking dipa. on tap at coalhouse stamford. very tasty hop mic

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Drucken på Brewskival 2016. Smak och doft av humle, citrus, granskott, grapefrukt, gräs med toner av tropisk frukt. Torr, frisk, stram, lagom sötma, fin beska med smak av citrusskal och toner av tall. Mums!

review: Drucken på Brewskival 2016. En torr, stram DIPA med rejäl beska. Trots det ändå plats för en del tropisk frukt och ännu mer zestig lite oljig citrus. Riktigt gott.

review: Can 0,5 thanks to Slacker. Pours hazy orange with small white head. Flowers, grape, citrus, mild pine, a bit dusty, hops and some sweetness from the malts. Full body and average carbonation. Excellent beer.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Nose was perfumy, but not heavy, a beautiful nose. Best beer I've had in a month. Bitterness avoids the tongue and throat and provides a refreshing motif.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Light orange with a thin white head. Large citrus nose that begs for attention. Orange, tangerine, and grapefruit. Hoppy but not overly bitter. I really like this one.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: Can. Pours a hazy golden with a nice hoppy head. Smells of hoppy sour citrus. Taste is very similar to smell. Sour grapefruit that is smooth and very satisfying. An excellent imperial IPA.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

review: Aroma of grapefruit, pine and some dried fruit. Pours a hazy Amber gold color with a short lasting white head. Taste of pine and grapefruit rind very bitter not well balanced. Oily feel with a bitter piney finish.

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA
review: can. Yellow with a nice white head. Tropical aroma, mango, peach. Mouthfeel is dry, tropical, nice and long bitter finish. Very good

beername: Pipeworks Ninja Vs Unicorn Double IPA

Poured deep yellow/light orange. Foamy white head. Beer was canned about two weeks ago. Pretty fresh. Pine/citrus notes. Taste is really smooth with nicely placed bitterness, really good standard ipa.

Smell is rather sweet, raspberry in a jam form. Taste is mildly sour.…

From notes on 3/7/15…

Draft. Almost blsck, brown head. Aroma pf chocolate civered espresso beans. Taste is rich dark bitter cocoa and burnt espresso. Delicious.

I quite enjoyed this imperial stout. It has a malty, roasted aroma and the palate is satisfying without being too heavy. It’s also not too sweet. It’s not quite as sweet as many imperial stouts, which makes it different but still…
Very dark with a thin light brown head. Roasty, malty, full, and smooth. Light toastiness, very balanced.

Pours solid black-brown with big foamy tan-colored head. Aroma is dominated by roasted malt, with hints of coffee and some unidentifiable fruits as well. Taste is mildly sweet a first, followed by a mild bitterness.…
A solid imperial stout although more bitter and not as fruity as some. Comperable to Ivan the Great by Brau Bros.
Aroma is dark fruit, roasted malts, mild vinous notes and coffee.  The flavor is coffee, chocolate, dark fruit, roasted malts and a big tartness/acidity into the finish.

Draft at CWBF - pours black with light brown head. Nose is coffee and boozy. Malty goodness with milk chocolate flavors. Well balanced.
Draft to taster. Looks solid; cola with tan lacing. Smells and tastes of semi-sweet dark malt with an average mouthfeel. A decent beer overall, but weak and thin for the style.

Poured at refrigerator temperature into a crystal tulip.…

12 oz bottle. Pours a dark black color with no head. Smells of roasted malt and bits of chocolate. Taste is not terribly complex, but good mouthfeel, with lots of roasty flavors. Not bad, but nothing special.

This is an extremely dark, toasty stout with flavor that knocks you off your seat. The color is about as black and dark as they come, and at 9.1 ABV you will not regret it.

Brown/black with brown foamy head, aroma of coffee, roasted malt, and a bit of chocolate. Taste is same with a light bitterness, not bad.
